headline: Georgia Power prepared for 2025 Hurricane Season
summary: With June 1 marking the official start of the 2025 Atlantic Hurricane Season, and the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) predicting an above-average season (read more), Georgia Power is committed to safely and reliably serving all customers, and prepared to respond to any hurricane or tropical storm which may impact Georgia.

headline: The Southern Company (SO) Upgraded at Jefferies on Promising Growth Prospects
summary: Jefferies upgraded The Southern Company (NYSE:SO) to Buy from Hold on solid growth outlook, while adjusting the price target from $102 to $100 on June 5. According to the analysts, Southern Co.’s possible success in future requests for proposals (RFPs) could lead to considerable rate base growth, outperforming industry peers. A Southern Co. subsidiary, Georgia […]
